question: Which state government launched Rythu Bandhu Scheme an investment support scheme to support the livelihood of farmers?
explanation: Telangana Government launched Rythu Bandhu Scheme an investment support scheme to support the livelihood of farmers.it is first of kind investment support scheme for farmers to be launched by any state in India. Under this scheme, farmers will directly get financial training support twice every year. About 58 lakh farmers who till over 1.42 crores acres of land in the state are expected to be benefited from the initiative.
